# [Phase 3] Subscription Implementation - Workspace Tiers

## Overview

Part of Epic #836 - Phase 3

Replace token-based pricing with workspace subscription tiers (Free/9/9).

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Database schema verified with subscription fields
- [ ] Subscription service implemented
- [ ] Stripe checkout integration complete
- [ ] Limit enforcement on gated features
- [ ] Upgrade prompts created
- [ ] Credit reset cron job implemented
- [ ] All tests passing (100% coverage)

See docs/plans/836.md Phase 3 section

## Out of Scope

- A/B testing features (Phase 4)
- Calendar features (Phase 5)
